org.beanfabrics.context

Interface ContextOwner

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IBigDecimalPM, IBooleanPM, IDatePM, IIconPM, IImagePM, IIntegerPM, IListPM<T>, IMapPM<K,V>, IOperationPM, ITextPM, IValuePM, PresentationModel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractOperationPM, AbstractPM, AbstractValuePM, BigDecimalPM, BooleanPM, DatePM, DecimalPM, IconPM, IconTextPM, ImageTextPM, IntegerPM, ListPM, MapPM, MoneyPM, OperationPM, TextPM

    public interface ContextOwner
    The ContextOwner is an interface for classes that can "own" a Context and provide public access to it.

    Please note that the owned context is assumed being constant. Implementors must not change their context reference during lifetime.

    Author:
    Michael Karneim
    See Also:
    Context
